description: This is an extremely addictive simulation game focusing on evolution and developing a species. The UI needs improvement, but everything else is fantastic!
summary: Very fun game with a unique idea

description: Really good alternative to Spore with all the best parts ehnanced and all the bad parts cut away. I havent seen anything like it that was as polished as this is though. My only gripe is how short it is, and theres enough replayability for it to remain interesting even after beating it. I'd recomend you give it a try.
good game for what it is, hope to see more content past the cell stage

Honestly I was bored and was browsing for games to install on my laptop on kubuntu (ubuntu plasma) and honestly this game is like the game evolution more gives you a lot more options and customizations. I love the graphics are really good and it has a good tutorial so you're not stuck in trying to figure out what to do. It's a great time killer and fun to play, im surprised not a lot of people have reviewed this recently its defefinetly a good game on linux!
I think this is a great successor to Spore's cell stage, one that captures the magic of what made that game fun.
summary: Good game, worth a playthrough and a donation

description: i how the developpement continue for a long time
Напоминает Spore, но механики посложнее и намного интереснее. С нетерпением жду разработку остальных уровней кроме одноклеточного.
